TOPOLOGY.INIT_FROM_SCRATCH_TXT: Creates a single new empty topology version.
TOPOLOGY.INIT_FROM_TEMPLATE_TXT: Creates a single topology based on the selected topology template.
TOPOLOGY.INIT_FROM_VERSION_TXT: Creates a new version by making a copy of every topologies defined in the given version (with the same qualifiers but new version number).

RECOVERY.CHOICE_ASK: What would you like to do with the topology ?
RECOVERY.DESCRIPTION: The following topology's dependencies have been updated:

ERRORS.RELEASED: A SNAPSHOT dependency of your topology has changed, but your topology has been released and cannot be changed. The changes in a SNAPSHOT dependency may generate issues in your current topology, that Alien4Cloud won’t be able to handle. Current version of alien4cloud does not authorise you to upload a released version having dependencies on snapshot archives. You may have to either delete the current topology (and re-upload it after fixing issues out of alien) or try to keep working with it (with the risk that this may fail later due to changes in the snapshot dependencies).

RECOVERY.ERRORS_TITLE: There are errors which prevent the topology from being recovered

UPLOAD_ERROR.ALIEN_MAPPING_ERROR: An internal error caused the import to fail. Please submit an issue with the stacktrace and archive.
UPLOAD_ERROR.CSAR_ALREADY_EXISTS: A released archive with the same name and version already exists in Alien4Cloud repository. In order to ensure stability for user using it, Alien4Cloud doesn't allow override of released archives. It is however possible to override a SNAPSHOT archive, if not used in a deployed topology.
UPLOAD_ERROR.CSAR_ALREADY_EXISTS_IN_ANOTHER_WORKSPACE: An archive with the same name and version already exists in Alien4Cloud repository in another workspace.
UPLOAD_ERROR.CSAR_ALREADY_INDEXED: The CSAR has already been indexed in Alien4Cloud with the same content
UPLOAD_ERROR.CSAR_IMPORT_ITSELF: An archive is not allowed to import itself.
UPLOAD_ERROR.CSAR_USED_IN_ACTIVE_DEPLOYMENT: A topology having a dependency from an archive with the same name and version is deployed. In order to ensure stability for the runtime processing, Alien4Cloud doesn't allow the overriding.
UPLOAD_ERROR.DEPENDENCY_NOT_VISIBLE_FROM_TARGET_WORKS: The dependency [ {{note}} ] i{{note}} s not visible from the target workspace
UPLOAD_ERROR.DEPENDENCY_VERSION_CONFLICT: The dependency [{{problem}}] is in conflict with the dependency [{{context}}]. The conflict has been resolved by using the latest version.
UPLOAD_ERROR.DERIVED_FROM_CONCRETE_TYPE_SUBSTITUTION: Substitution derive from concrete type [ {{note}} ], please use an abstract type.
UPLOAD_ERROR.DERIVED_FROM_NOTHING: The tosca type [{{note}}] must derive from the base type [{{context}}], Alien has automatically added [{{context}}] as its parent
UPLOAD_ERROR.DUPLICATED_ELEMENT_DECLARATION: The element [ {{note}} ] has already be defined in this definition file.
UPLOAD_ERROR.ENTRY_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND: Entry definition file has not been found. Please put a valid definition file at the root of the archive.
UPLOAD_ERROR.ERRONEOUS_ARCHIVE_FILE: Cannot load the archive file. Please check that the file is a valid zip.
UPLOAD_ERROR.INVALID_ICON_FORMAT: Icon file is not a supported image format.
UPLOAD_ERROR.INVALID_SCALAR_UNIT: Expected type was a TOSCA scalar unit, both unit and value are required.
UPLOAD_ERROR.INVALID_YAML:
The File does not respect YAML format,
({{problem}}).
UPLOAD_ERROR.LABEL: Errors
UPLOAD_ERROR.MISSING_DEPENDENCY: Dependency [{{note}}] cannot be found in Alien4Cloud repository.
UPLOAD_ERROR.MISSING_FILE: Reference file {{note}} cannot be found within the archive.
UPLOAD_ERROR.MISSING_TOPOLOGY_INPUT: The input [{{problem}}] referenced by the property [{{problem}}] of [{{context}}] node was not found in the inputs list
UPLOAD_ERROR.MISSING_TOSCA_VERSION: Tosca version is not specified and is required.
UPLOAD_ERROR.RELATIONSHIP_NOT_BUILT: Not able to build the relationship for the requirement [{{note}}] (please read errors).
UPLOAD_ERROR.REQUIREMENT_CAPABILITY_NOT_FOUND: The capability corresponding to the requirement [{{note}}] can't be identified.
UPLOAD_ERROR.REQUIREMENT_NOT_FOUND: Requirement definition for [{{note}}] was not found.
UPLOAD_ERROR.REQUIREMENT_TARGET_NODE_TEMPLATE_NAME_RE: Node template name is required for the requirement definition, it should be defined as the value of a node 'node'.
UPLOAD_ERROR.SINGLE_DEFINITION_SUPPORTED: Alien4Cloud  currently supports a single definition file within an archive.
UPLOAD_ERROR.SNAPSHOT_DEPENDENCY: Snapshot dependency [{{note}}] is not allowed in released archive.
UPLOAD_ERROR.SYNTAX_ERROR: Syntax error: Yaml definition for the type {{note}} doesn't follow the TOSCA specification.
UPLOAD_ERROR.Size: The property [ {{path}} ]'s size does not satisfy constraint (empty)
UPLOAD_ERROR.TOPOLOGY_DETECTED: A topology template has been detected in the archive and created with name: {{note}}
UPLOAD_ERROR.TOPOLOGY_UPDATED: A topology template has been detected in the archive and updated  : {{note}}
UPLOAD_ERROR.TOSCA_TYPE_ALREADY_EXISTS_IN_OTHER_CSAR: An archive cannot override a node type of an other archive : {{problem}}
UPLOAD_ERROR.TOSCA_VERSION_NOT_FIRST: Tosca version must be the first line of the service template.
UPLOAD_ERROR.TRANSITIVE_DEPENDENCY_VERSION_CONFLICT: The transitive dependency [{{problem}}] is in conflict with the direct dependency [{{context}}]. The conflict has been resolved by using the direct dependency version: [{{note}}].
UPLOAD_ERROR.TYPE_NOT_FOUND: Referenced type [ {{note}} ] cannot be found neither in the archive or its dependencies. Please check the import section or add the type to your archive.
UPLOAD_ERROR.ToscaPropertyConstraint: Constraint [ {{path}} ] is not valid or cannot be applied on the defined property.
UPLOAD_ERROR.ToscaPropertyConstraintDuplicate: The constraint [ {{path}} ] already existed. The same constraint cannot be defined more than once.
UPLOAD_ERROR.ToscaPropertyDefaultValueConstraints: The default value for the property [ {{path}} ] do not respect its constraint.
UPLOAD_ERROR.ToscaPropertyDefaultValueType: The default value for the property [ {{path}} ] do not follow its type.
UPLOAD_ERROR.ToscaPropertyType: Property [ {{path}} ] has an invalid type, please check supported TOSCA types. Details [ {{message}} ]
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNKNOWN_CAPABILITY: Capability [{{note}}] is unknown for this node.
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNKNOWN_CONSTRAINT: Constraint [{{note}}] does not exists in TOSCA specification.
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNKNOWN_IMPLEMENTATION_ARTIFACT: Failed to find any Artifact Type for the extension [ {{note}} ]. The artifact type won't be supported.
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNKNOWN_TOSCA_VERSION: Tosca version is unknown and not recognized by Alien4Cloud .
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNKNWON_WORKFLOW_STEP: Workflow step [{{note}}] doesn't exists and has been ignored
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNKNWON_WORKFLOW_STEP_RELATIONSHIP_TARGE: The relationship ({{note}}) defined as target of the workflow step does not exist in the specified node.
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNKNWON_WORKFLOW_STEP_TARGET: The target node ({{note}}) specified in the workflow step does not exist in the topology.
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNKOWN_GROUP_MEMBER: The group member [{{note}}] doesn't exist so is ignored
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNRECOGNIZED_PROPERTY: Property [ {{note}} ] is unknown and has been ignored.
UPLOAD_ERROR.UNSUPPORTED_SUBSTITUTION: Substitution is not supported on archive that defines types.
UPLOAD_ERROR.VALIDATION_ERROR: Declared type is not valid: {{context | translate:note}}
UPLOAD_ERROR.WORKFLOW_INLINED_WORKFLOW_NOT_FOUND: Referenced inline workflow {{note}} does not exists.
UPLOAD_ERROR.YAML_SCALAR_NODE_EXPECTED: A YAML node of type scalar is expected here.
